title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 1867/92 of 30 June 1992 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3905/91 opening and providing for the administration of Community tariff quotas for certain industrial products (first series 1992)
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EEC) No 1867/92
of 30 June 1992
amending Regulation (EEC) No 3905/91 opening and providing for the administration of Community  tariff quotas for certain industrial products (first series 1992)
THE COUNCIL OF  THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: For order Nos 09.2711 and 09.2727, the  table in Article 1 (1) of Regulation (EEC) No 3905/91 is hereby replaced by the following table: > TABLE POSITION>

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its  publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation  shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 30 June 1992. For the Council
The President
Arlindo MARQUES CUNHA
